reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2006, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We chose this hotel largely because everywhere else within 500 miles seemed to be booked up - given it was Bank Holiday Weekend this was probably no surprise.
reviews.title: Great place to stop

likes.liked: — Friendly service, spacious room, good location
likes.disliked: — The floral decorations in the room were a bit sad...

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2006, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The staff were very friendly on our arrival and the room we got (No 14 - right at the end of the hall) was huge and had a great balcony overlooking the carpark and beautiful gardens at the back of the hotel.
reviews.title: Lovely Hotel

likes.liked: — Great room with a lovely view
